1.title: Twitch Recap 2024
1.description: The Official Chat Badge of the Year. It takes hard work and KomodoHype to receive it. You should be proud to tell everyone you know about this.

1.title: GLHF Pledge
1.description: Signed the GLHF pledge in support for inclusive gaming communities

1.title: Twitch Recap 2023
1.description: This user bled purple like it was their job, and was one of the most engaged members of Twitch in 2023!

1.title: Gone Bananas Badge
1.description: This gilded banana badge was scored by sharing a lulz-worthy clip during April Fool’s week 2025.

Ты на втором боссе K3 и тебе выпадает кубик 6 3 3. Количество шипов на каждом из прыжков равняется a, b, c соответственно. Найди X: (2)^3 + b - (a)^3 * c * 18 + x = 4605
